articles.title: European roundup: Icardi scores late PSG winner after Messi substituted - The Guardian
articles.description: Paris Saint-Germain recovered to beat Lyon 2-1 at the Parc des Princes while Juventes and Milan drew 1-1 and Real Madrid defeated Valencia with two late goals

articles.author: world.rugby
articles.title: Rugby World Cup 2021 Europe Qualifier day two: Ireland and Scotland back in the hunt for a place in New Zealand ｜ Rugby World Cup 2021 - Rugby World Cup 2019
articles.description: Ireland and Scotland both secured their first victories of the Rugby World Cup 2021 Europe Qualifier on Sunday to maintain their hopes of winning the tournament and booking their ticket to New Zealand.
articles.content:
Ireland and Scotland reignited their Rugby World Cup 2021 Europe Qualifier hopes on Sunday to leave the race for a ticket to New Zealand wide open.
